mapper.sql: ID, cluster_id, plan_id, vm_name, vm_role,job_id, status, created_time, modified_time
mapper.select: select cl.* from info_cluster_vm_clear_log cl inner join info_cluster_operation_plan icop on cl.plan_id = icop.plan_id and icop.state in (-1,-2) inner join info_cluster_vm icv on cl.cluster_id = icv.cluster_id and cl.vm_name=icv.vm_name and icv.state <> -1 where cl.status IN(0,-1) and cl.vm_role='task'
select * from info_cluster_vm_clear_log where status = 1 and job_id is not null
mapper.insert: insert into info_cluster_vm_clear_log (ID, cluster_id, plan_id, vm_name,vm_role, job_id, status, created_time, modified_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{clusterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{vmRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into info_cluster_vm_clear_log (cluster_id, plan_id, vm_name,vm_role, status, created_time,job_id,modified_time) values
(#{log.clusterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{log.planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{log.vmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{log.vmRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{log.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{log.createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{log.jobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{log.modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
update info_cluster_vm_clear_log
cluster_id = #{clusterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vm_name = #{vmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vm_role = #{vmRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update info_cluster_vm_clear_log set cluster_id = #{clusterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vm_name = #{vmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vm_role = #{vmRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
